readme:
This workflow automatically promotes your new Shopify products on Twitter and Telegram. This workflow is also featured in the blog post [_6 e-commerce workflows to power up your Shopify store_](https://n8n.io/blog/no-code-ecommerce-workflow-automations/#promote-your-new-products-on-social-media).

## Prerequisites

  * A Shopify account and [credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/shopify/)
  * A Twitter account and [credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/twitter/)
  * A Telegram account and [credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/telegram/) for the channel you want to send messages to.



## Nodes

  * [Shopify Trigger node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.shopifytrigger/) triggers the workflow when you create a new product in Shopify.
  * [Twitter node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.twitter/) posts a tweet with the text "Hey there, my design is now on a new product! Visit my {shop name} to get this cool {product title} (and check out more {product type})".
  * [Telegram node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/) posts a message with the same text as above in a Telegram channel.
readme_zh:
该工作流能自动在Twitter和Telegram上推广您Shopify店铺的新商品。此工作流亦收录于博客文章《[6个提升Shopify店铺的电商工作流](https://n8n.io/blog/no-code-ecommerce-workflow-automations/#promote-your-new-products-on-social-media)》中的"在社交媒体推广新品"章节。

## 前提条件

* 拥有Shopify账号及[认证凭据](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/shopify/)
* 拥有Twitter账号及[认证凭据](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/twitter/)
* 拥有Telegram账号及目标频道的[认证凭据](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/telegram/)

## 节点说明

* [Shopify触发器节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.shopifytrigger/)：当Shopify新增商品时触发工作流
* [Twitter节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.twitter/)：发布推文"嘿，我的设计上新啦！快来{店铺名}选购这款超赞的{商品名称}（更多{商品类型}等你发现）"
* [Telegram节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/)：在Telegram频道发布与上述内容相同的消息

（注：译文对技术文档特有的简洁句式进行了适当调整，在保持专业性的同时增强中文可读性。关键术语如"node"统一译为"节点"，交互式元素如"{}"保留原格式，链接保持可跳转功能。技术平台名称Shopify/Twitter/Telegram等专有名词不做翻译，符合国内技术文档惯例。）
